original: aushn'i sha bi dza y'a s'a dha nam /
analyzed: aushn'i sha bi dza y'a s'a dha nam /

original: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Achievement of the Uṣṇīṣa-vijayā

original: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas zla ba la bhr'um dkar po yongs su gyur pa las zhal gsum spyan gsum ma /
analyzed: sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas zla ba la bhr'um dkar po yongs su gyur pa las zhal gsum spyan gsum ma /
translated: One should imagine the Uṣṇīṣa-vijayā with three faces and three eyes, arisen from a white bhrūṃ on a moon, as previously taught in the rite,

original: lang tsho gsar la bab pa /
analyzed: lang tsho gsar la bab pa /

original: lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang na bza' dang ldan pa /
analyzed: lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang na bza' dang ldan pa /
translated: endowed with divine ornaments and garments,

original: phyag brgyad pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag brgyad pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma bsam par bya'o //

original: ser po dang nag po ni g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal lo //
analyzed: ser po dang nag po ni g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal lo //
translated: The right and left faces are yellow and black.

original: g-yas kyi phyag bzhi rnams su sna tshogs kyi rdo rje dang / padma la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / mda' dang / mchog sbyin ma'o //
analyzed: g-yas kyi phyag bzhi rnams su sna tshogs kyi rdo rje dang / padma la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / mda' dang / mchog sbyin ma'o //
translated: In the four right hands are a variegated vajra, the body of a Buddha seated on a lotus, an arrow, and a boon-granting hand;🔽in the four left hands are a bow, a noose, a goad, and a bell.

original: g-yon gyi phyag bzhi rnams su gzhu dang / sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhabs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya dang / bum pa gang ba'o //
analyzed: g-yon gyi phyag bzhi rnams su gzhu dang / sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhabs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya dang / bum pa gang ba'o //
translated: In the four left hands, a bow, a sword with a threatening forefinger, the gesture of protection, and a full vase.

original: mchod rten gyi phug gi khong na gnas par bskyed la /
analyzed: mchod rten gyi phug gi khong na gnas par bskyed la /
translated: One should generate the deity as dwelling in the interior of the stupa.

original: padma la gnas pa'i sa bon snying gar bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: padma la gnas pa'i sa bon snying gar bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should visualize the seed syllable on a lotus at the heart.

original: de'i rjes su spyi bo dang / dpral ba dang / mgrin pa dang / lte ba dang / rkang pa rnams su go rims bzhin du h'um tr'am hr'i:aam aa:zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i rnam par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes su spyi bo dang / dpral ba dang / mgrin pa dang / lte ba dang / rkang pa rnams su go rims bzhin du h'um tr'am hr'i:aam aa:zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i rnam par bsam par bya'o //
translated: After that, one should visualize the syllables hūṃ, traṃ, hrīḥ, aṃ, and āḥ at the crown, forehead, throat, navel, and feet, respectively.

original: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so //
analyzed: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so //
translated: The sādhana of Uṣṇīṣavijayā is complete.

original: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo ts'a ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing zhus so//
analyzed: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo ts'a ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing zhus so//
translated: The paṇḍita Amoghavajra and the Khotanese translator-editor, the bhikṣu Vṛddhi, translated and revised it.
